title: One Bedroom, One Bath Home In Great Location.
posting_body: Great location, minutes from 99, Valley Ranch, and Kingwood.
This 2020 one bedroom, one bath home sits on nearly an acre with 4 other homes but still feels private and secluded.
You will enjoy the covered front porch, open living and kitchen area with a good sized primary bedroom and full bath.
W&D, refrigerator and basic Wifi is included.
Landlord pays for water, trash and lawn maintenance.
